oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study and Service Group of First Presbyterian Church, Nashville, Tennessee, 1941 April 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: “Chancellor buys ticket to Kaltenborn lecture: the Study and Service Group of First Presbyterian Church will sponsor a lecture to be given by H. V. Kaltenborn, noted commentator, April 30 at the War Memorial Building. Pictured above and reading from left to right are: Mrs. G. A. Puryear, ticket chairman; Chancellor O. C. Carmichael, who bought the first ticket, and Mrs. Walter S. Finley, president of the group.” Source: Nashville Banner, April 4th, 1941. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kaltenborn, H. v. (Hans), 1878-1965; Carmichael, Oliver C. (Oliver Cromwell), 1891-1966
